mods.abstract: Background is divided into black upper half and lower white half. Five sets of triangular forms are joined together by long, looped strings. As the strings move from the white to black spaves, their colors change in opposition. White strings on black, etc. Orange and green dash-like lines are added to the strings and triangular forms in a random pattern.

name.namePart: Louisiana State University (Baton Rouge, La.). Museum of Art
